page.title: 08S.W.GUILDFORD:HOBBIES
page.content:
One of the most popular hobbies in Guildford is collecting and there are some unusual collecting habits. One of these is collecting "White Elephants". Others collect medals, jugs and even photographs. There are many antique or collectors' shops in the area. Other common hobbies include golf, photography, reading, gardening and fishing at local ponds. One fishing area is the Broadwater Lake near Godalming. Horse riding is another much-loved hobby and many Guildfordians spend their free time in this way. There are a few riding schools in the area but not in the town. There are many opportunities to learn music either in instrumental lessons or by playing or singing in an orchestra or choir.
Amanda Martin
